title: Trump tees up richest presidential administration in US history
shortDescription: Trump said he plans to nominate Doug Burgum, Howard Lutnick, Linda McMahon, Elon Musk, and Vivek Ramaswamy to his next administration.

title: Ethics committee split on Gaetz report
shortDescription: After a split vote, the House Ethics Committee is not set to release its report into allegations against former Rep. Matt Gaetz.

title: Trump picks faced sexual misconduct allegations
shortDescription: Four picks for Donald Trump's administration, Matt Gaetz, Pete Hegseth, Robert F. Kennedy Jr. and Elon Musk, have faced sexual misconduct allegations.

title: What to know about sexual misconduct allegations against Trump picks
shortDescription: Four of Donald Trump's administration picks — Matt Gaetz, Pete Hegseth, Robert Kennedy Jr. and Elon Musk — have been accused of sexual misconduct.

title: Several Trump Cabinet picks mired in sexual misconduct allegations
shortDescription: Four of Donald Trump's nominees to high-profile jobs have faced allegations of sexual misconduct, complicating their pathway to government service.

title: Who is Stephen Miller, architect of Trump's mass deportation plans?
shortDescription: He helped design Trump's Muslim ban. Now, he will help the president-elect carry out his signature campaign promise: mass deportation.

title: Matt Gaetz to Dr. Oz: Here's who Trump picked for his Cabinet so far.
shortDescription: After a brief stint in Trump's first administration, the president-elect wants the conservative firebrand to become the next U.S. ambassador to the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.

title: Big changes are coming: Trump Cabinet member picks send a message
shortDescription: Trump's controversial Cabinet picks include former Fox News host Pete Hegseth for Defense secretary and former Rep. Matt Gaetz for attorney general.

title: House Ethics Committee doesn't release highly anticipated Matt Gaetz report
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson had urged the bipartisan panel to keep the report secret.

title: Rep. Marcy Kaptur, longest serving congresswoman, wins in Ohio
shortDescription: The Associated Press has called the race for Ohio's 9th Congressional District seat for Democratic Rep. Marcy Kaptur over GOP state Rep. Derek Merrin.

title: Trump win in 2024 is not proof 2020 election stolen | Fact check
shortDescription: There was not record-breaking turnout in the 2024 presidential election, and numerous recounts and audits have affirmed Biden won the 2020 election.

title: Senate Democrats ask for FBI files on Matt Gaetz, Trump choice for AG
shortDescription: The Justice Department and House Ethics Committee each investigated Matt Gaetz, but he was never charged and he denied sex-trafficking allegations.

title: Texas offers Trump a border site for detaining immigrants
shortDescription: After an antagonistic relationship with Biden, Texas officials are offering help for Trump's mass deportation plans.

title: Mike Johnson announces transgender bathroom ban in parts of Capitol
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson announced a policy banning transgender people from using some bathrooms at the Capitol that correspond with their gender.

title: What does Trump's Agenda47 say about education? What to know
shortDescription: Donald Trump has named Linda McMahon as education secretary to his Cabinet. Here's what to know about his agenda for education policy.

title: Trump begins post-election push for NY criminal case dismissal
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's defense lawyers began their formal push to have his New York criminal case dismissed based on the election outcome.
